feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
